fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Prepare to defend yourself at night, raising your defense to Basic and dealing a Powerful attack to all visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only prepare to defend yourself 3 times.
- Roleblock Immunity
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town **or** kill 3 people with your ability.
